name: es-md5
title: JavaScript MD5
description: Module-friendly fork of [JavaScript MD5](https://github.com/blueimp/JavaScript-MD5). MD5 implementation. Compatible with server-side environments like Node.js, module loaders like RequireJS, Browserify or webpack and all web browsers.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.build: cd js && uglifyjs md5.js -c -m -o md5.min.js --source-map md5.min.js.map
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A js
scripts.postversion: git push --tags origin master master:gh-pages && npm publish
